title: 2006년 Miller v. Philadelphia Geriatric Center 사건
summary: 미국 USA, Federal 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Miller v. Philadelphia Geriatric Center. 판결일: 2006-09-12. 법원: Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Vicki MILLER, Administratrix of the Estate of Henry S. Miller, Appellant v. PHILADELPHIA GERIATRIC CENTER; Charles Bongiorno; Phil Markowitz; John Doe; Jane Doe; United States of America
**판결일**: 2006-09-12
**법원**: Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit
**관할**: USA, Federal

**판사**: Fisher, Nygaard, Smith

## 변호인

James L. Griffith, Esq., (Argued), Fox Rothschild, Philadelphia, PA, for Appellant., K.T. Newton, Esq., (Argued), Office of the United States Attorney, Philadelphia, PA, for Appellee United States of America., Jill B. Clarke, Esq., (Argued), McKis-sock & Hoffman, Philadelphia, PA, for Ap-pellee Phil Markowitz.

## 인용

- 463 F.3d 266
